Stanley Goodspeed.Action: Jokes with Marvin about owing five dollars, maintaining a light-hearted atmosphere during boring work.
Demonstrates patience and offers reassurance to Marvin, his trainee.
Corrects Isherwood's ignorance about Bosnian-Serbian tensions, suggests reading a newspaper.
